body_html: Yes, that would help - I think we still should figure out why we have that build dependency at all for build time generators. I've found that internally we also have some code to load libcuda dynamically (currently ooo so can't check details), not sure how this relates to the patch here / how hard integrating it will be :)

body: Yes, that would help - I think we still should figure out why we have that build dependency at all for build time generators. I've found that internally we also have some code to load libcuda dynamically (currently ooo so can't check details), not sure how this relates to the patch here / how hard integrating it will be :)
